channel.title: PS3: Hype mountain not delivering? Failure?
channel.description:
"There's no horse armor, etc... [b]It's a technical limitation. They just don't have enough memory to load every piece of downloadable content[/b]. They tried it, did some work arounds, [b]but the performance isn't there.[/b] They hope to have some, but they're going to have to pick and choose [b][unlike the 360 version, which has tons of downloadable content, all of which can be used in the game][/b]".
Furthermore, the shader which helps the textures in the distance is coming to the 360.[/quote] vid o' conference: http://www.neogaf.com/forum/showthread.php?t=140933 If it can't handle what we've had on PC and 360 for some time, what else is there to think? Discuss.

item.title: PS3: Hype mountain not delivering? Failure?
item.dc:creator: @DeadBird DeadBird
item.description:
@DeadBird wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:4, topic:55690”][quote author=goatee link=topic=78955.msg874666#msg874666 date=1170898219]

Discuss.

No. Who cares. It’s a console that some will buy and some (tramps with no money) will not.
[/quote]

Or, you could simply shut the fuck up.[/quote]
Thats what I feel like saying to SCEA’s director.
An interview with the guy:

[b]EGM[/b]: PS3's launch has had the most negativity of any launch surrounding it, what happened?

Tretton: The problem we have…it’s society in general.


Best person ever.

Read full topic
item.source: PS3: Hype mountain not delivering? Failure?
